comment: Smart Data Models - RotatingMachineDynamics adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/RotatingMachineDynamics/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Abstract parent class for all synchronous and asynchronous machine standard models.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: damping
contents.comment: Damping torque coefficient (D).  A proportionality constant that, when multiplied by the angular velocity of the rotor poles with respect to the magnetic field (frequency), results in the damping torque.  This value is often zero when the sources of damping torques (generator damper windings, load damping effects, etc.) are modelled in detail.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: inertia
contents.comment: Inertia constant of generator or motor and mechanical load (H) (>0).  This is the specification for the stored energy in the rotating mass when operating at rated speed.  For a generator, this includes the generator plus all other elements (turbine, exciter) on the same shaft and has units of MW*sec.  For a motor, it includes the motor plus its mechanical load. Conventional units are per unit on the generator MVA base, usually expressed as MW*second/MVA or just second.   This value is used in the accelerati

contents.name: saturationFactor
contents.comment: Saturation factor at rated terminal voltage (S1) (> or =0).  Not used by simplified model.  Defined by defined by S(E1) in the SynchronousMachineSaturationParameters diagram.  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0.0

contents.name: saturationFactor120
contents.comment: Saturation factor at 120% of rated terminal voltage (S12) (> or =S1). Not used by the simplified model, defined by S(E2) in the SynchronousMachineSaturationParameters diagram.  Typical Value = 0.12. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: statorLeakageReactance
contents.comment: Stator leakage reactance (Xl) (> or =0). Typical Value = 0.15. Default: 0.0

contents.name: statorResistance
contents.comment: Stator (armature) resistance (Rs) (> or =0). Typical Value = 0.005. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)
